channel.title: I wonder
channel.description:
Ive noticed this on mopars client were you can say change a hammer into a crystal bow with the ::setitem command and alch it for the crystal bows money.. do you think this would be possible in real rs?
If you could use this change command in real rs2 think of how rich you would become lol.
I dont know ifs its possible but a suggestion

item.title: I wonder
item.dc:creator: @Fishygame Fishygame
item.description:
@Fishygame wrote:

No, I’m sure Jag(e)x checks to make sure it’s really what you’re alching before you alch it.

In case you haven’t noticed, private server are much more exploitable then Jag(e)x’s servers.

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

No but im saying… I do this ALOT on no spawnable servers…

Turn a hammer into a crystal bow and it alchs for the crystal bow price

I think the client is telling the server that its trying to alch a crystal bow which was really a hammer but you turned it into a crystal bow, so the server thinks it really is the bow and gives you the cash

I use this method on alot of non spawnable servers =)

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Its possible to do on regular rs, but like on moparscape it is only clientside so the server knows what the item really is.

In other words it is just for fun

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

hm lol k it was just a thought i was thinking

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Moparscape is to Runescape as cap guns are to M16s.

So, yes, you could shoot a cap gun at a terrorist, but no, he wouldn’t die.

Read full topic
